content.p:
* ยง 263. Reports. The advisory board, through its chairperson, shall
submit to the office a quarterly report relative to the status of
compliance with the plan, pursuant to rules and regulations promulgated
by the commissioner of the division of criminal justice services upon
recommendation of the office. The report shall include, but not be
limited to: compliance with specific goals and objectives as reflected
in the plan; ability of programs to meet performance criteria;
compliance with timetables; utilization by the court of the programs
included in the plan; effect of such programs on diverting the jail
bound population and reducing the over crowding problem; and any other
information requested by the office and available to the advisory board
with respect to this article.
 * NB Repealed September 1, 2027
